main.description: Resolve a schema by its permanent NSID identifier. When version is omitted, resolves to the most recently created schema with the given NSID.

handle.description: DID or handle of the schema owner

schemaId.description: The permanent NSID identifier for the schema (the {NSID} part of the rkey {NSID}@{semver})

version.description: Specific version to resolve. If omitted, resolves to latest.

uri.description: AT-URI of the resolved schema record

cid.description: CID of the resolved schema record

errors.name: SchemaNotFound
errors.description: No schema found with the given NSID
